patthana21.11:4.1: Āsavavippayuttaṃ naanāsavaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā āsavavippayutto anāsavo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.11:4.2: Āsavavippayuttaṃ naanāsavaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā āsavavippayutto sāsavo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.11:5.1: Āsavavippayuttaṃ naanāsavaṃ naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā āsavavippayutto sāsavo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.11:6.1: Āsavavippayuttaṃ nasāsavaṃ naabyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavavippayutto sāsavo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.11:6.2: Āsavavippayuttaṃ naanāsavaṃ naabyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavavippayutto sāsavo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.11:6.4: Hetuyā dve, adhipatiyā dve … pe … avigate dve.
